title: Reformation sure and stedfast, or, A seasonable sermon for the present times shevving the life and death of reformation : preached June 15, 1641.
author: Ford, Thomas, 1598-1674.
publisher: Printed by J. D. for Henry Overton ...,
notes: Attributed to Thomas Ford.  Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
